title: Otohiko Kiyono
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
Kiyono was born in <a href="Kanagawa%20Prefecture">Kanagawa</a> on April 23, 1973. After graduating from high school, he joined <a href="Nagoya%20Grampus">Nagoya Grampus Eight</a> in 1992. He debuted in <a href="1992%20J.League%20Cup">1992 J.League Cup</a>. In 1992, he moved to German <a href="VfL%20Osnabruck">Osnabrück</a> on loan. In 1993, he returned to Grampus Eight. However he could not play at all in the match and retired end of 1995 season.
